goal: Block n8n local workflow files - enforce cloud-only storage

fields.who: Claude Code sessions working with n8n workflows
fields.what: Block writing/downloading n8n workflow JSON locally; enforce cloud as single source of truth
fields.why: Local workflow files cause dangerous confusion - Claude overwrites cloud with stale local code (Issues #19, #33)
fields.how: Upgraded stale_workflow_json_detector (WARN->BLOCK for writes), added n8n_download_blocker and n8n_post_update_cleanup hooks
fields.lest: Continued drift between local and cloud state, data loss, workflow corruption
fields.with: Existing hook infrastructure, n8n MCP, temp directory pattern
fields.measuredBy: Zero persistent workflow JSON outside temp/, all n8n_get_workflow calls blocked
